projects.name: HOLIDAZE
projects.description: HOLIDAZE is a travel agency website, created as a project for my 2nd semester @Noroff. The project goal is to create a functional travel agency website, using technologies we have learned during the education. This includes the full process from an user story to a finished product.

projects.name: BIDR
projects.description: BIDR is an auction website, created as a project for my 3rd semester @Noroff. The project goal is to create a functional auction website, using technologies we have learned during the education. This includes the full process from an user story to a finished product.

projects.name: ReactShop
projects.description: ReactShop is a simple e-commerce website, created as a project for my 3rd semester @Noroff. The project goal is to create a functional e-commerce website, using technologies we have learned during the education. This includes the full process from an user story to a finished product.
